category.name: Cross Probing.Search Mechanism
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TraceReport_Default_Expansion_Level
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default level of expansion for trace report tree. If the traceability report is also showing trace link objects, the depth of the report will be multiplied by 2. For example, if the preference value is 3 and the traceability report will contain 6-level deep trace report for trace links. For single-object trace reports, the tree is expanded to the mentioned level. For multiple-objects trace reports, each tree node is expanded to the specified level in each root. The default value is 2. Positive integer value greater than 0 are valid values for this preference.
